title: Snares, Roots & Stuns Should Cancel All Dashes
body: This is just stupid oh how this is works, if you cast a dash, jump, blink etc and you get CC'd during the small channel time you will still complete the dash, this is just stupid as if you hit someone who is in the middle of a dash, you deserve to cancel that dash and leave them stuck.

replies.body: No it's not stupid. Channel times exist for a reason. So people have time to react before they get CC'd.

> [{quoted}](name=Cloud273,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BnWrIAQy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-18T19:45:10.572+0000)
>
> No it's not stupid. Channel times exist for a reason. So people have time to react before they get CC'd.

im saying that if i see someone who is channelling a dash, think trist or aatrox with dash that take ahwhile, if you CC them during the animation/channel then it should stop them in there tracks.

> [{quoted}](name=boss10000,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BnWrIAQy,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-04-18T19:52:58.217+0000)
>
> im saying that if i see someone who is channelling a dash, think trist or aatrox with dash that take ahwhile, if you CC them during the animation/channel then it should stop them in there tracks.

Except those are not channels, those are casting delays.

This is how *every casting delay* functions around CC. Silence doesn't stop a spell mid-cast delay; try silencing/stunning/suppressing a Ryze while he's going through Overload's animation, and the spell will still complete. Try blinding someone when their basic attack animation is finishing, and the attack will still land.

This is systemically *normal.* This is *supposed to happen.*

How will I escape a hard leona engage as corki? Right,now his W can be cast as she snares you and procs stun mid flight and you still travel the full distance, and the stun duration starts mid flight, so by the time you land, the stun is almost done XD

Tbh though it is a bit unfair because it means leona has no way to get her full lock down combo in before a corki uses valkyrie, and even if she gets the AA stun it is basically worthless because his flight is uninterupted

I agree with this. Champions are already harder to hit when dashing, yet CCing them mid-dash just causes them to eat up a portion of your crowd control while still moving. Catching an opponent in the middle of a gapcloser should feel rewarding, and should waste the dash rather than the CC.
